original_text: We do not want anyone to think bad things about our work. So we do nothing that might cause trouble for anyone.
korean_text: 우리가 이 직분이 비방을 받지 않게 하려고 무엇에든지 아무에게도 거리끼지 않게 하고

sentences.original_text: to think bad things about our work
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 일에 대해 나쁜 것들을 생각하길

sentences.original_text: that might cause trouble for anyone
